params.name: API_KEY
params.description: Existing API key (if any). Else SoundCloud scraper will try to fetch one for you :)

params.name: force
params.description: IF it should forcefully parse version

params.name: options.fetchStreamURL
params.description: If it should fetch stream url

params.name: KEY
params.description: Existing API key (if any). Else SoundCloud scraper will try to fetch one for you :)

methods.name: fetchStreamURL
methods.description: Fetch stream url from soundcloud track url

params.name: trackURL
params.description: Track url to fetch stream from

params.name: data
params.description: Raw data to instantiate this class

methods.name: toJSON
methods.description: Returns JSON version of the data

props.name: playCount
props.description: Number of times this song was played

props.name: publishedAt
props.description: Timestamp when this song was published

methods.name: toJSON
methods.description: Returns JSON object of the song

methods.name: parseDuration
methods.description: Parse duration and convert it to ms.

props.name: fetchAPIKey
props.description: If it should fetch api key on startup

props.name: removeUnknown
props.description: If it should remove unknown items from the playlist

props.name: createdAt
props.description: Timestamp when the user was created

props.name: playCount
props.description: Total play count of the song
